text: Lee Sherman Dreyfus (pronounced DRAY-fuss; June 20, 1926 â€“ January 2, 2008) was an American educator and politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. He was the 40th Governor of Wisconsin from January 4, 1979 to January 3, 1983. Dreyfus died of respiratory failure caused by heart surgery on January 2, 2008 in Waukesha, Wisconsin at the age of 81.Mark Pitsch and Jason Stein. "Former Gov. Dreyfus dies, remembered as maverick". Wisconsin State Journal, January 4, 2008. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Educators from Milwaukee Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Governors of Wisconsin Category:Politicians from Milwaukee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Military people from Wisconsin
title: Lee S. Dreyfus
